marklogic.body: You know in hunger games the male from district 12 said he smells roses! at MSU last week a girl died in hubbard Hall from roseville... we know the 12th district female was concern about Burning up and in Burn treatment you are placed in a HUBBARD TANK. we know that sheriff lucas son went through the window at EMU and died, and george cantors daughter went through the window at U of M and died and in ann arbor there is a gang that punches people at random to knock them out on the street, can they go into the dorm? we know the 12th district is roseville in congress sandy levin area... 1929 stock market collapse brokers were going out the window... WTC upper floors the people were jumping out the windows... but is hunger games is HOPE.. and i hope this gal survives. THANKS FOR THE MEMORIES .. struggle to survive in a data driven fixed world of affirmative action...
